name: Kepler-186f
description:
Kepler-186f is a first-person adventure and survival game set on an alien planet. After the crash of the AXIAL mining ship on the planet Kepler-186f, Dave, a crew member and sole survivor, must find a way to leave. In his quest for survival he will discover the true cause of the accident, as well as a special relationship between the creatures of the planet's ecosystem.

This game demo is my final project for the course "Mixed and Virtual Reality Games/Applications Development" at the University of the Aegean.
